Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks head coach Jason Kidd speaks after the team's loss to the Suns, saying he needs to get more energy from his group from the tip and the bench has to 'participate' to help out Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
Others: The game ended with Jusuf Nurkic making two free throws with 0.8 seconds left in the game, having been fouled on an offensive rebound.
